original_text: Some people will even say, “I am the Messiah.” Other people will say, “I am a prophet from God.” But their words will be false. They will do strange and powerful things for people to see. If possible, they would even deceive the people that God has chosen.
korean_text: 거짓 그리스도들과 거짓 선지자들이 일어나서 이적과 기사를 행하여 할 수만 있으면 택하신 자들을 미혹하려 하리라

sentences.original_text: I am a prophet from God.
But their words will be false.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들의 말은 거짓이 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will do strange and powerful things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 기이하고 강력한 일들을 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: they would even deceive the people
